Spells:
Delay Poison (Serpentine2 Conj): Touched gains immunity to poison for 20 hr
Dominate Monster (Serpentine9 Ench): R75' Target obeys self thoughts for 20 dy (DC 22 Will neg)
Hold Monster (Serpentine5 Ench): R300' Immobilizes target for 20 rd (DC 18 Will neg)
Hypnotism (Serpentine1 Ench): R75' Fascinates and makes suggestible 2d4 HD of creatures in 15' radius for 2d4 rd (DC 14 Will neg, +2 during combat, -2 single target)
Irresistible Dance (Serpentine8 Ench): Touched dances (-4 AC, -10 Reflex) for d4+1 rd (DC 21 Will for 1 rd)
Mass Suggestion (Serpentine6 Ench): R300' 20 targets in 15' radius follow reasonable suggestion for 20 hr (DC 19 Will neg)
Poison (Serpentine4 Necr): Touched suffers -1d3 Constitution/rd for 6 rd (DC 18 Fort neg)
Summon Monster III (Serpentine3 Conj): R75' 1 3rd-, 1d3 2nd-, or 1d4+1 1st-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Summon Monster VII (Serpentine7 Conj): R75' 1 7th-, 1d3 6th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Magic Notes:
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Bloodline Serpentine: May affect animals, magical beasts, and monstrous humanoids with mind-affecting and language-dependent spells
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Den Of Vipers: May use Summon Swarm effects w/serpents that inflict Con damage and entanglement 1/dy
Ectoplasmic Spell: May cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target; uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half or all spell damage to acid damage; uses +1 spell slot
Eschew Materials: Cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Scaled Soul: May assume form of reptilian humanoid or snake at will
Serpentfriend: May use Speak With Animals at will with reptiles
Thundering Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes deafened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
Notes
Familiar: Viper "Goafru"
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Companion Spell Resistance; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Scry On Familiar; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Familiar Stats: AC: 25; CMB: +11; CMD: 18; Cha: 2; Con: 8; Dex: 17; HD: 20; HP: 55; Initiative: +3; Int: 14; Melee: +15 1d2-2; SR: 23; Save Fort: +5; Save Ref: +9; Save Will: +13; Size: T; Str: 4; Wis: 13
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: Deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: Share emotions up to 1 mile
Scry On Familiar: Master views companion 1/dy
Share Spells: Master share self spell w/companion w/in 5'
Speak With Like Animals: Talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: Talk w/master in secret language
